home.mensaje_saludo: Make sure your event is executed seamlessly and without complications.

menu_marketplace.title: Event Marketplace
menu_marketplace.info1: An online platform that consolidates every aspect of event logistics from digital invitation creation to vendor discovery can greatly streamline and simplify the planning process.
menu_marketplace.info_lista1: It is important to note that your platform's sole function is to generate quotations.
menu_marketplace.info_lista2: Payment transactions are handled directly between users and service providers.

tipo_centros.title: Type of events
tipo_centros.info: That's a great idea! Using digital invitations can be an excellent way to facilitate the organization and management of events at any type of venue.

tipo_eventos.title: Type of events
tipo_eventos.info: Perfect for preparing any type of event!

invitacion.title: Event Invitation
invitacion.info: Having the option to edit digital invitations to your liking is a key feature for customizing events your way

checkin.title: Check In
checkin.info1: Real-time check-in is an outstanding feature for effective event management. Providing organizers with access to real-time data regarding their event can significantly enhance the overall experience.
checkin.list5: Guests are currently attending the event
checkin.list6: Check-in using QR code or guest list

galeria.title: Galery
galeria.info: Implementing a feature that enables guests to upload and download event photos is an outstanding method for fostering interaction and creating shared memories.

proveedor.title: Become a supplier
proveedor.p1: In the management of opportunities through social media, the practice of attaching individual images of each product is considered inefficient.
proveedor.p2: It is advisable, instead, to provide a QR code that directly links to their personal page on TicketParty.
proveedor.p3: This approach enhances communication by showcasing the complete product catalog via a single, streamlined link.
